## BIDS-Mosaic
A BIDS tool for creating PDFs containing slices of nifti images

## Installation
```
pip install bids-mosaic
```

## Usage
```
bids-mosaic <bids_dataset_directory>
```

For more options:
```
bids-mosaic --help
```
